hopobject.name: ntopng
hopobject.body: ntop develops open-source network traffic monitoring applications. We have optimized the code of ntopng (Web-based Monitoring Application) and nProbe (NetFlow Probe) so that they can be compiled from source and run smootly on your BeagleBoard device. You can use our tools for monitoring your Internet traffic connections, know what apps and users monopolize your bandwidth, identify potential network security issues.
